meanings.definition: The emission of light resulting from friction, as in the crushing of crystals or the rubbing of certain materials.
meanings.sent1: When I crushed the candy, I saw triboluminescence as it sparkled in the dark.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed triboluminescence when she rubbed the quartz crystal vigorously.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they created triboluminescence by crushing glow sticks in the dark.
meanings.sent4: The triboluminescence from the snapping glow bracelet lit up the room like tiny fireworks.
meanings.sent5: The magic of triboluminescence made the crystal shards glow like stars in the night sky.
